ygData.subject: Re: RE: Cleric/Bard armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is obviously someone at Verant that needs the difference between challenging and tedious explained to him. Preferable by someone with a high 1H blunt
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Dec 01/99, Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:

>... Having a monster placeholder for a spawn that is 8 hours is
> absoultely ridiculous. I don't envy clerics/shaman.
>

There is obviously someone at Verant that needs the difference between
challenging and tedious explained to him. Preferable by someone with a
high 1H blunt skill.


--
